item.title: Download HoRNet Corrosion 1.1.2
item.description: HoRNet Corrosion is an audio effects plugin designed primarily as a ring modulator, adding roughness, distortion and creative modulation to the sound. It works by modulating the input audio signal with a synthetic waveform (white noise, sine, sawtooth, square) or an external audio source, creating a cross modulation distortion that enriches and distorts the original sound.
